title: Reapers With Issues
description: Death and the other Reapers have a challenge. Earth's population has made soul collection a big problem, and according to Death's figures, it will only get worse. Death is a skilled but reluctant bureaucrat who tries to enlist help before Human souls start backing up.But since no good deed goes unpunished, Death and the other Horsemen will have to put up with a whole new approach to management from Heaven.What is an entity to do?REAPERS WITH ISSUES follows the journey of the Grim Reaper as he struggles day to day to survive middle management Hell.
author: H.E. Ellis
